text: Harry Barton (1874 – 1954) was an English professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:1954 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Northwich Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Castle True Blues F.C. players Category:Fairfield Athletic F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Witton Albion F.C. players Category:Middlewich Athletic Rangers F.C. players Category:Northwich Victoria F.C. players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Harry Barton (footballer)
